parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if vehicle collision lights are on otherwise [[false]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isCollisionLightOn''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]


 
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_collisionLightOn = [[isCollisionLightOn]] heli;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isEngineOn]], [[isLightOn]], [[setPilotLight]], [[setCollisionLight]], [[isIRLaserOn]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 6, 2015 - 08:25 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Bind Collision light action to UserAction 2
<code>this [[addAction]] ["", {
	_this [[select]] 1 [[action]] [
		["CollisionLightOn", "CollisionLightOff"] [[select]] [[isCollisionLightOn]] (_this [[select]] 0), 
		_this [[select]] 0
	];
}, "", -10, [[false]], [[true]], "User2", "_this <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[driver]] _target"];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
